snippet: The Sixers, a middling team with no discernible on-court leader and few fans, made the playoffs last season, but they are overshadowed in this city by a love for the Eagles and the Flyers.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers, a middling team with no discernible on-court leader and few fans, made NBA playoffs in 2011, but they are overshadowed by Philadelphia's other professional sports teams.
lead_paragraph: The Sixers, a middling team with no discernible on-court leader and few fans, made the playoffs last season, but they are overshadowed in this city by a love for the Eagles and the Flyers.

headline.seo: The Sixers Are Lovelorn in Philadelphia
headline.main: The 76ers Have a Home, but It Still Isn’t Their Town
headline.print_headline: The 76ers Have a Home, But It Still Isn’t Their Town
